text: This can include identifying changes in the age distribution of the disease or changes in disease-causing strains, as well as assessing herd immunity and long-term immunity.Coverage data are of paramount importance to correctly interpret measures of the vaccine’s impact, especially given that a reduction in cervical cancer incidence cannot be detected for many years after the vaccine has been introduced in a country.
